Constructor Detail

AccountManager

private AccountManager()
Singleton pattern. It is not possible to create a CountryService in the common way. So this constructor is private.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static AccountManager getInstance()
Singleton pattern. Static method that controls the object creation.

Returns:
A account manager instance.

createPlayer

public void createPlayer(Player player)
                  throws PlayerExistsException,
                         DataAccessException
Adds the desired player into the database.

Parameters:
player - Player object to create an entry in the database with.
Throws:
PlayerExistsException - Thrown if the player or email already exists.
DataAccessException - Common data access exception.

Gets all players in database

Returns:
Vector of all registered players in the database.

getPlayerList

public java.util.Vector<Player> getPlayerList(boolean loggedInPlayers)
                                       throws DataAccessException
Gets all players in database and can return all logged in players.

Parameters:
loggedInPlayers - True if you want to get all logged in players.
Returns:
Vector of all registered players in the database. If loggedInPlayers == true you will only get the logged in players.
Throws:
DataAccessException - Common data access exception.

           throws PlayerAlreadyLoggedInException,
                  WrongPasswordException,
                  PlayerDoesNotExistException,
                  DataAccessException
The desired player will be logged in.

Parameters:
player - Player you want to login.
Throws:
WrongPasswordException - Password typed in didn't match.
PlayerDoesNotExistException - Player you want to login doesn't exist.
PersistenceException
DataAccessException - Common data access exception.
PlayerAlreadyLoggedInException

logout

public void logout(Player player)
            throws PlayerDoesNotExistException,
                   DataAccessException
This will logout the desired player, regardless if he is logged in or not.

Throws:
PlayerDoesNotExistException - Player you want to logout doesn't exist.
DataAccessException - Common data access exception.

logout

public void logout()
            throws DataAccessException
All logged in players will be logged out.

Throws:
DataAccessException - Common data access exception.
